Pre-Game Insights: India are set to take on Bangladesh in a three-match T20I series starting on October 6, 2024.
Several players who will be playing in the upcoming Test Series against New Zealand have been rested for this series.
India is testing their bench strength and trying out fringe players with the T20 World Cup 2026 still close to two years away.
22-year-old pacer Mayank Yadav is certain to make his debut for Team India at some point in the series against Bangladesh.
Mayank Yadav impressed for Lucknow Super Giants in the IPL 2024, clocking a speed of 156.7 kmph and picking up 7 wickets in just four games.
Pacer Harshit Rana and all-rounder Nitish Kumar Reddy are also set to get their debut caps for India in this series.
